Class AppointmentOutcomeRecordDB

java.lang.Object
database.Database<AppointmentOutcomeRecord>
database.AppointmentOutcomeRecordDB
public class AppointmentOutcomeRecordDB extends Database<AppointmentOutcomeRecord>
A database class to manage AppointmentOutcomeRecord objects. Handles CRUD operations and provides methods to interact with appointment outcome records, including loading and saving to a CSV file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AppointmentOutcomeRecordDB()
    Constructs an AppointmentOutcomeRecordDB instance and initializes the list of outcome records.
